           java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password,
           Config config)
            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                   java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Constructor of the Classe TDConnexion
        Parameters:
        server - adresse for Teradata Server
        username - username for Teradata Server
        password - password for Teradata Server
        config - configuration
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if error while connecting to Teradata Server
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if erreur while searching the Class "com.teradata.jdbc.TeraDriver"
